Question.Subject: I gave a site the wrong email?
Question.Content: I was buying incense on https://glassparadise.3dcartstores.com/ and my dad typed in the wrong email. I need the email to get the code to see if my item shipped but i don't know how. What could i do to change the email so i could get the shipping code?
Question.ChosenAnswer: https://glassparadise.3dcartstores.com/Contact-Us_ep_5.html use this form on thier site and explain them what happen also if you remember the transaction number just type it in the message box

Answer.Content: send the right e mail and tell them the wrong one was sent
https://glassparadise.3dcartstores.com/Contact-Us_ep_5.html use this form on thier site and explain them what happen also if you remember the transaction number just type it in the message box
